data.title: LinguistAI
data.subtitle: Advanced Chatbot Development
description: Led the development of an advanced chatbot for LinguistAI using Large Language Models (LLMs), including LangChain and LLaMa 2, to provide personalized language learning experiences.
Developed mobile application features using React Native and established a CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions, Docker, and Ubuntu.

data.title: Visually Coherent Image Inpainting of Human Faces
data.subtitle: Computer Vision Project
description: Developed a DCGAN model with an encoder network for image inpainting, focusing on human face reconstruction as part of a team.
Utilized the CelebFaces Attributes dataset, implementing pre-processing techniques such as image masking and batch processing.

data.title: ZooNet
data.subtitle: Bird Classification CNN
description: Developed a CNN for bird classification using PyTorch, focusing on a subset of ImageNet with extensive training and validation datasets as part of a team.
Conducted hyperparameter experiments and implemented a bounding box approach for bird detection.

data.title: Erasmust
data.subtitle: Full-stack Web Application
description: Built a full-stack web application using React, Redux, Spring Boot, and RESTful API as part of a team.
Managed the CI/CD pipeline using Docker, Jenkins, and Git in a Linux environment.

data.title: Rudelang
data.subtitle: Programming Language for IoT Devices
description: Designed a new programming language specialized for IoT devices, implementing a lexical analyzer with Lex and a parser with Yacc as part of a team.

data.title: Bilader
data.subtitle: Android Application
description: Built an Android app using Java and Android Studio that was published on Google Play Store as part of a team.
Developed a backend with Apache Tomcat, JSP Servlets, and MariaDB, implementing features like cookies and 2FA login.
